text: A12a. Always keep learning about personal finance and don't be afraid to ask questions #WinnieSun
A.12  Save
column4: invest

text: A11a. I‚Äôve met people who make millions but hardly have anything saved because they overspend. #WinnieSun
A.11 Definitely push to make more but know spending less than you earn is so important. #WinnieSun
A10a. Investing in the stock market is another great way to diversify your income streams i.e. passive income #WinnieSun
A10. Market your skills. Maybe it‚Äôs babysitting. Maybe it‚Äôs teaching singing lessons or social-media management. #WinnieSun
Nice work @SanabriaJav #winniesun https://t.co/3KaMNINKcV
A9b. Invest in your company‚Äôs 401(k) if they have one at least so you get the company match #WinnieSun
A9a. Work toward multiple goals: paying down student debt
column4: saving for emergencies

text: A9.  Have an emergency fund of at least 3-6 months of expenses. #WinnieSun
A8a. Love learning about personal finance & helping others learn too #WinnieSun
A8. My current job as a wealth/personal finance reporter at @WSJpersfinance #WinnieSun
A7a. Automate your savings. Use a flexible-spending account #WinnieSun
